ns1:Asset.ns1:name: MWS2R3 - Avecto - Prereqs
ns1:Asset.ns1:body:
# Load Common functions . .\Logging.ps1 . .\GlobalRepository.ps1 . .\LaunchProcess.ps1 . .\FilesUtility.ps1 . .\PlatformUtils.ps1 . .\UsersUtility.ps1
# get current script location $scriptPath = split-path -parent $MyInvocation.MyCommand.Definition $scriptName = $MyInvocation.MyCommand.Name
ConfigureLogging $scriptPath $scriptName
######################################################################### # Main #########################################################################
$DomainNetBIOS = (get-globalvariable("Global\DomainNetBIOS")).value
Log "**** Starting: Common Pre-Reqs Config... ****" Log "`n"
Log "Copy required content locally" # Will be copied to C:\Users\<profile> Get-AppFiles "PC Devices\Avecto" Get-AppFiles "PC Devices\Misc\WindowsFeatures_Prereq" Log "`n"
Log "Set Timezone..." tzutil /s "$OS_TIMEZONE" If ($LastExitCode -ne 0) {Log "ERROR: Timezone could not be set. Possibly due to inability to enumerate variables."; EXIT 1} Log "`n"
Log "Installing Windows 2012 Roles (.NET 3.5 - includes .NET 2.0 and 3.0)..." # .NET 4.0 is already included in the Server SOE Log " **KB2966828 | .NET 3.5 prereq on Win2012 as per KB3005628" CMD /c Start /WAIT WUSA.exe "$ScriptPath\WindowsFeatures_Prereq\Windows8.1-KB2966828-x64.msu" /quiet /norestart /log:"$env:windir\Debug\ConfigMgr2012\$env:Computername\$env:computername-KB3005628.log" Log " **.NET 3.5" $Feature = Install-WindowsFeature -Name NET-Framework-Core -Source "$ScriptPath\WindowsFeatures_Prereq\sxs" -LogPath "$env:windir\Debug\ConfigMgr2012\$env:Computername\$env:computername-Roles_.NET3.5.log" # Source switch used for .NET 3.5 only If (!($Feature.Success)) {Log "ERROR: Failed to install Windows Roles and Features. Exiting..."; EXIT 1} Log "`n"
Log "Installing Windows 2012 Features (BITS, GPMC, AD Tools)..." $Feature = Install-WindowsFeature -Name BITS-IIS-Ext,RSAT-Bits-Server,GPMC,RSAT-ADDS-Tools,RSAT-ADLDS -LogPath "$env:windir\Debug\Avecto\$env:Computername\$env:computername-Features.log" If (!($Feature.Success)) {Log "ERROR: Failed to install Windows Roles and Features. Exiting..."; EXIT 1} Log "`n" Start-Sleep -Seconds 30
Log "Define Local Admins..." # Does not require domain credentials to run net user /add PCDevices_Admin PCdevices@dmin # Create local account AddUserToLocalAdministrators -ServerName "$env:Computername" -UserName "$env:Computername\PCDevices_Admin" AddUserToLocalAdministrators -ServerName "$env:Computername" -UserName "$DomainNetBIOS\DEL-G-CSC Infrastructure Services" Log "`n"
Log "Creating User Profile Cleanup Task..." $SchTasks_Date = (Get-Date).AddDays(5).ToString("MM/dd/yyyy") $ProfPath = $env:UserProfile # Create Agility User cleanup script echo "Get-CimInstance win32_userprofile -Verbose | Where {`$_.LocalPath -eq '$ProfPath'} | Remove-CimInstance -Verbose" > $env:windir\Debug\Avecto\Agility-DelProf-$env:USERNAME.ps1 SchTasks /Create /SC "Once" /SD $SchTasks_Date /ST 01:00 /F /RU "SYSTEM" /TN "Agility-DelProf-$env:USERNAME" /TR "Powershell.exe -File '$env:windir\Debug\Avecto\Agility-DelProf-$env:USERNAME.ps1'" Log "`n"
Log "**** Finished: Common Pre-Reqs Config... ****"
